column6: For our Salem-based X-Men, you'd think a trip to the South would be all buttermilk biscuits and bacon. But in issue 17, Nightcrawler and Rogue's journey past the Mason-Dixie line puts them in the crosshairs of a familiar face known for her feminine...do we really need to say it?  And in issue 18, X-Legend Chris Claremont takes us behind the visor in a special spotlight story that will change the way you look at Cyclops! Don't miss this classic tale of the original X-Man.
